mapper.sql: category_brand_id, brand_id, cbrand_status, created, modified, sort_num, third_lev_cid, second_lev_cid, deleted
mapper.select: select c.brand_id, b.brand_logo_url, b.brand_name from item_category_brand c left join item_brand b on(c.brand_id=b.brand_id) where c.third_lev_cid=#{cid} and c.deleted=1 and b.deleted=1

SELECT c.brand_id, c.third_lev_cid, c.second_lev_cid, b.brand_logo_url, b.brand_name FROM item_category_brand c LEFT JOIN item_brand b ON(c.brand_id=b.brand_id) WHERE c.second_lev_cid=#{cid} and c.deleted=1 and b.deleted=1

select c.brand_id, c.third_lev_cid, c.second_lev_cid, b.brand_logo_url, b.brand_name from item_category_brand as c left join item_brand as b on(c.brand_id=b.brand_id) where
brand_name like CONCAT('%',#{brand},'%' )
and c.deleted=1 and b.deleted=1
